references.paper_title: Neural networks and physical systems with emergent collective computational abilities
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of neural networks, introducing concepts that have significantly influenced the development of attention mechanisms.
This paper introduced the Transformer architecture, a fundamental model in modern deep learning which is the subject of this paper's investigation.

references.paper_title: How powerful are graph neural networks?
references.reason: This paper is crucial for understanding the capabilities and limitations of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), which are a core component of the proposed Graph-Aware Isomorphic Attention.

references.paper_title: Principal neighborhood aggregation for graph nets
references.reason: This paper details Principal Neighborhood Aggregation (PNA), an important alternative to GNNs that is explored in this work for enhancing attention mechanisms.

references.paper_title: Preflexor: Preference-based recursive language modeling for exploratory optimization of reasoning and agentic thinking
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical background for the proposed hierarchical approach and the application of category theory to transformers.
